name: git-sync
tagline: A command-line tool for automating directory synchronization with Git
description: Git-Sync is a CLI tool that schedules and automates synchronization between local directories and Git repositories. It works well for backups, content syncing, and versioning lightweight deployments.

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Automatically sync local directories to Git repositories for version control

features.title: Version Control Integration
features.description: Leverage Git's versioning for file history and rollback capabilities

features.title: Selective Syncing
features.description: Choose specific files or directories to include or exclude from synchronization

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource usage suitable for continuous background operation

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Use Git remotes as backup destinations for important local files
